cbioportalR 0.0.0.9000

Get gene mutations by sample ID or Study

get_mutations.Rd

Get gene mutations by sample ID or Study

get_mutations(sample_ids = NULL, study_id = NULL, panel = NULL, genes = NULL)

Arguments

sample_ids

A character vector of sample ids
study_id

A character vector of length 1 indicating study_id. See get_studies() to see available studies.
panel

OPTIONAL argument. A character vector of length 1 indicating a specific panel to be used. If not NULL, the panel will be looked up with get_panel() and only genes in that panel will be returned.
genes

A list of genes to query. default is all impact genes.

Value

A dataframe of mutations for each sample ID (in maf file format)

Examples

get_cbioportal_db("public")
get_mutations(sample_ids = c("TCGA-19-5959-01", "TCGA-18-4083-01"))

#> No genes specified by user, so querying curated list of impact genes.
